#summary How to run tools from Windows machines

== How to run tools from Windows machines ==

=== 1. Download Xming and Putty ===

  * Download Xming and Putty from the following links.
   * Xming: [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/sourceforge/xming/Xming-6-9-0-31-setup.exe?use_mirror=superb-east download]
   * Putty: [http://the.earth.li/~sgtatham/putty/latest/x86/putty.exe download]

=== 2. Install Xming ===

  * Click _Xming-6-9-0-31-setup.exe_ and install Xming by using the default settings.
  * Launch Xming by clicking [Xming - Xming] on the start menu.

=== 3. Run Putty ==

  * Click 'putty.exe'.
  * On the category, choose [Connection - SSH - X11].  Check 'Enable X11 forwarding' option.
  * On the category, choose [Session].  Type 'verbs.colorado.edu' for the host name, and '22' for the port.
  * Click [Open] button at the bottom.  If a security alert window will prompt, click [Yes] button.
  * Type your ID and password.

== 4. Run Jubilee ==

  * Goto Jubilee directory by typign
  * cd /home/verbs/shared/propbank/jubilee
